Paragraph: The charge carrier mobilities of PffBB-n - based devices were estimated on hole - only and electron - only devices using the space - chargelimited current ( SCLC ) model , and the results are summarized in Table 4.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |

| PffBB-n |

The entity "SCLC" does not clearly refer to a material name, and therefore, it has been removed from the table.

Paragraph: The charge carrier mobilities of PffBB-n - based devices were estimated on hole - only and electron - only devices using the space - chargelimited current ( SCLC ) model , and the results are summarized in Table 4.

Sure! Here are the Property Value entities in the given paragraph:

| Property Value | Description |
| --- | --- |
| PffBB-n | Material used for charge carrier mobilities estimation |
| hole | Type of charge carrier (positive) |
| electron | Type of charge carrier (negative) |
| space-charge-limited current (SCLC) | Model used for estimating charge carrier mobilities |
| Table 4 | Summary of results |
